Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
{4}{G}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. They gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]“I'm just happy to be together with my bots.”[/i]
